body: god this could have been a perfectly good harem series but why do authors just ruin their perfectly good works with forced drama. The "ntr" that happened here wasnt even bad or the worst ive read but its just fucking unnecessary and just makes you annoyed. And even worse was the end to the "drama" what did they do to the antagonist? FMC just says "please forgive her" even though she legit succeeded in mind breaking you. No joke even if this is "a happy ending" you can tell FMC will end up ntring MC again cause she legit broke at the end she even admits she "lost" to roberta. So many wasted pages on forced drama this coulda been a top tier harem
I got to engaged in the story and went soft. This legit would be a good harem anime.
I remember reading this as a rookie, though this was a heavy story lol,now that I'm experienced I know that this is almost a vanilla if compared to what I've seen
This is trash. The guy is weak and all those girls are slut... if anything the guy should had beat the shit out of dude. And make those bitches get mentally depressed

@machan12
Screw you asshole, I read this crap because of your comment. Not NTR my ass.

I thank machan12 for his analysis, but after reviewing the manga, I would still caution vanilla-lovers to move along if they want a rage-free masturbation session. As jazzboy's comment can clearly attest to. 

Also anyone who puts themselves in a sex-friends/friends-with-benefits/etc situation, you only have yourself to blame when you get hurt at the end. Human body chemistry prevents us from having emotionless sex, deal with it.
It's a shame that there are so many Kotoyoshi Yumisuke's works without an english translation. This artist is great!!

It's not exactly NTR. One chick drugs him, he feels guilty and leaves to be in drugger's employ, on the condition he doesn't hurt his not-girlfriend anymore (not-girlfriend since neither has established their actual romantic relationship beyond sex friends). Not-girlfriend demands return of not-boyfriend, submits to sexual abuse, but dude eventually finds out, rebels, and takes his not-girlfriend back home.

So, cheating, absolutely, NTR? Nope!

This has been brought to you by the Anti-NTR Institute, dedicated to identifying and blacklisting all genuine NTR content.
So does He NTR his girl back or what happens ,Could I get a quick rundown
